1.3.5.name: wordpress/comment-control-by-word-recognition
1.3.5.description:
This wordpress plugin controls the comments visitors tries to post on your articles, posts, pages or whatever! It works on word recognition.

For example. You have added the word viagra into the database, because you dont want to see any comments which contains this word. Comments with the following words will be rejected:

viagra You have viagra ? You have a Xviagrapackage ? Cheap XXviagra! Cheap viagraXX!
